categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
Beat the game
Glitches are allowed
Timing starts when you press new game
Timing ends when the game has fully faded to black on the day that you beat the game.

ZSNES and Snes9x 1.4x are banned

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
Get married to one of the 5 wives.
Timing starts when you press new game
Timing ends when the game fades to black, when the girl has accepted your proposal.

ZSNES and Snes9x 1.4x are banned

categories.name: All Days
categories.rules:
Complete every day in the game
Timing starts when you press new game
Timing ends when the game has fully faded to black on the day that you beat the game.

ZSNES and Snes9x 1.4x are banned

categories.name: Best Ending
categories.rules:
Beat the game with the best ending
Glitches are allowed
Timing starts when you press new game
Timing ends when the game fully faded to black on the day that you beat the game.

Runs must include the best ending cutscene in the video.
Using speedup on emulators is banned, including when checking to see if you got the ending.

The best ending requires:
Married
2 children
900+ happiness
10 Power Berries eaten,
10,000 G
own 1+ cow
own 1+ chicken,
hugged dog 100+ times

ZSNES and Snes9x 1.4x are banned

*Timer begins upon confirming character gender, name, and birthday, and ends on sleeping the last day
*100% is defined as:
- All power berries
- All event photos
- All bugs
- All fish
- All plants (not crops)
- All house extensions
*Photos that are obtained through trades are not required

subcategories.name: Neutral Ending
subcategories.rules: -Must get the "Neutral" ending

subcategories.name: Good Ending
subcategories.rules: -Must get the "Good" ending

categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
-Timing begins on confirming character gender, name, birthday, blood type, pet, and pet name.

-Timing ends when the screen fades to white to begin credits.

-Reach the credits as fast as possible.

subcategories.name: Male
subcategories.rules: -Must use the Male gender.

subcategories.name: Female
subcategories.rules: -Must use the Female gender.

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
-Timing begins on confirming character gender, name, birthday, blood type, pet, and pet name.

-Timing ends when the screen fades black after the wedding. (Male)

-Timing ends when the screen fades to white to begin the Credits. (Female)

subcategories.rules: -Must use the Male gender.

subcategories.name: Female
subcategories.rules: -Must use the Female gender.

categories.rules:
-Timing begins on confirming character gender, name, birthday, blood type, pet, and pet name.

-Timing ends when the screen fades to white to begin credits.

-You must show proof of 100% before the credits.

-100% is defined as:

-All Power Berries.
-All items from the Tool Shop.
-All 13 books from the Book Shop.
-All tools and tool upgrades. (Including Pak).
-All Fish.
-Shipping bin turned into a fridge.
-Garbage Disposal
-Fixed Lighthouse.
-Wife must give birth. (Male only).
-Achieve the "Good" Ending.

subcategories.name: Male
subcategories.rules: -Must use the Male gender.

subcategories.name: Female
subcategories.rules: -Must use the Female gender.

subcategories.name: Bad Ending
subcategories.rules:
-Timing begins on confirming character gender, name, birthday, blood type, pet, and pet name.

-Timing ends when the screen fades to white to begin credits.

-Must accept the farm at the start of the game.

-Must get the "Bad" ending.

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
Time starts when you select a new file.
Get Married to 1 of the 5 marriage candidates.
Time ends on the first wedding bell.
Video required.

Runs use the Real Time Attack (RTA) timing convention, meaning runs are timed using an external timer (such as LiveSplit) which can't be paused during the run. The timer does not have to be shown on the video, but the time must be verifiable.

Emulator times are hidden by default. Please still feel free to submit emulator runs with the correct settings (See the Guide section), other emulators or settings will not run the game as well and may be subject to scrutiny. This will be handled on a case by case basis.

Using CheatEngine or any memory viewer to track or edit any values is not allowed.

Turbo/RapidFire are not allowed.

subcategories.name: All Photos
subcategories.rules:
Time starts when you select a new file.
Collect all 16 Photos in any order.
Time ends upon scrolling to the last page in a completed Photo Album.
Video required.

Runs use the Real Time Attack (RTA) timing convention, meaning runs are timed using an external timer (such as LiveSplit) which can't be paused during the run. The timer does not have to be shown on the video, but the time must be verifiable.

Emulator times are hidden by default. Please still feel free to submit emulator runs with the correct settings (See the Guide section), other emulators or settings will not run the game as well and may be subject to scrutiny. This will be handled on a case by case basis.

Using CheatEngine or any memory viewer to track or edit any values is not allowed.

Turbo/RapidFire are not allowed.

subcategories.name: All Recipes
subcategories.rules:
Time starts when you select a new file.
Collect all 35 Recipes in any order.
Kitchen is required for verification.
Time ends when the player scrolls to the final page of the recipe book. (A full list is 2 full pages and 3 recipes on the 3rd page)
Video required.

Runs use the Real Time Attack (RTA) timing convention, meaning runs are timed using an external timer (such as LiveSplit) which can't be paused during the run. The timer does not have to be shown on the video, but the time must be verifiable.

Emulator times are hidden by default. Please still feel free to submit emulator runs with the correct settings (See the Guide section), other emulators or settings will not run the game as well and may be subject to scrutiny. This will be handled on a case by case basis.

Using CheatEngine or any memory viewer to track or edit any values is not allowed.

Turbo/RapidFire are not allowed.

subcategories.name: All Power Berries
subcategories.rules:
Time starts when you select a new file.
Collect all 10 Power Berries in any order.
The Blue Power Berry is not required as it does not appear on the in-game checklist.
Time ends when the player character is holding the final Power Berry.
Video required.

Runs use the Real Time Attack (RTA) timing convention, meaning runs are timed using an external timer (such as LiveSplit) which can't be paused during the run. The timer does not have to be shown on the video, but the time must be verifiable.

Emulator times are hidden by default. Please still feel free to submit emulator runs with the correct settings (See the Guide section), other emulators or settings will not run the game as well and may be subject to scrutiny. This will be handled on a case by case basis.

Using CheatEngine or any memory viewer to track or edit any values is not allowed.

Turbo/RapidFire are not allowed.

categories.name: Girl Photos
categories.rules:
Time starts when you select a new file.
Collect this Photo.
Time ends when you scroll to the page containing the Photo (or upon opening the Album if this Photo is on the first page).
Video required.

Runs use the Real Time Attack (RTA) timing convention, meaning runs are timed using an external timer (such as LiveSplit) which can't be paused during the run. The timer does not have to be shown on the video, but the time must be verifiable.

Emulator times are hidden by default. Please still feel free to submit emulator runs with the correct settings (See the Guide section), other emulators or settings will not run the game as well and may be subject to scrutiny. This will be handled on a case by case basis.

Using CheatEngine or any memory viewer to track or edit any values is not allowed.

Turbo/RapidFire are not allowed.

subcategories.name: Any%
subcategories.rules:
Time starts when you select a new file. Get to the credits in the fastest time possible on a freshly created file. Time ends when the screen fades to black and the credits begin.

Video required.

Runs use the Real Time Attack (RTA) timing convention, meaning runs are timed using an external timer (such as LiveSplit) which can't be paused during the run. The timer does not have to be shown on the video, but the time must be verifiable.

Emulator times are hidden by default. Please still feel free to submit emulator runs with the correct settings (See the Guide section), other emulators or settings will not run the game as well and may be subject to scrutiny. This will be handled on a case by case basis.

Using CheatEngine or any memory viewer to track or edit any values is not allowed.

Turbo/RapidFire are not allowed.

subcategories.name: Other Photos
subcategories.rules:
Time starts when you select a new file.
Collect this Photo.
Time ends when you scroll to the page containing the Photo (or upon opening the Album if this Photo is on the first page).
Video required.

Runs use the Real Time Attack (RTA) timing convention, meaning runs are timed using an external timer (such as LiveSplit) which can't be paused during the run. The timer does not have to be shown on the video, but the time must be verifiable.

Emulator times are hidden by default. Please still feel free to submit emulator runs with the correct settings (See the Guide section), other emulators or settings will not run the game as well and may be subject to scrutiny. This will be handled on a case by case basis.

Using CheatEngine or any memory viewer to track or edit any values is not allowed.

Turbo/RapidFire are not allowed.

categories.name: Ranch Master
categories.rules:
Called "Ranch Master" after the myth of such a title. 

The only requirement is to trigger the credits, which itself requires the player to achieve the following in sequence (each in a separate year-end evaluation): expand your farm's land, obtain the fishing rod, obtain the pickax, and obtain the umbrella.

Time starts at "new game" and stops on the final fade-out frame to credits.

categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
-Timing starts on selecting New Game.
-Timing ends once the Credits begin after completing all 5 Town Restoration plans.
-Multiplayer is banned.

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
-Timing starts on selecting New Game.
-Timing ends once the Credits begin after the Wedding.
-Multiplayer is banned.

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
Timing starts when you select New Game
Timing ends when regular gameplay continues after the proposal cutscene ends.

The Player must be the one to propose to Muffy, Celia, and Lumina

categories.name: All Trophies
categories.rules:
Timing starts when you select New Game
Timing ends when the game has faded to black just before the credits

This is a Special Edition exclusive category.

categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
Get to the end of the game as fast as possible.
Timing starts when you select New Game
Timing ends when the game has faded to black just before the credits

subcategories.name: Farmer
subcategories.rules: Child must choose the Farmer career.

subcategories.name: Rancher
subcategories.rules: Child must choose the Rancher career.

subcategories.name: Scholar
subcategories.rules: Child must choose the Scholar career.

subcategories.name: Artist
subcategories.rules: Child must choose the Artist career.

subcategories.name: Musician
subcategories.rules: Child must choose the Musician career.

subcategories.name: Athlete
subcategories.rules: Child must choose the Athlete career.

subcategories.name: All Animals
subcategories.rules:
You are required to collect 1 of each animal.
The animals are: Dog, Cow, Horse, Chicken, Sheep, Goat, Duck and a Cat.
All animals must be alive when the timer is stopped
You do not need to have both genders or 1 adult and 1 child for each animal, e.g. if you have a bull, you do not need any other type of cow, be it female adult, male child, or female child.
Timing starts when you select New Game
Timing ends when the final animal cutscene has fully faded to black

subcategories.name: Single%
subcategories.rules:
Don't marry anyone!
Timing starts when you select New Game 
Timing ends when the screen turns to black after denying the marriage proposal

categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
Timing start when you select New Game
Timing ends when the game fades black, after the Goddess revival cutscene, just before regular gameplay returns.

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
Timing starts when you select New Game.
Timing ends when regular gameplay continues after the proposal cutscene ends.
Pressing Z on the third-port controller to obtain all items is allowed.

Player must be the one to propose to Bachelor.

categories.name: Marriage No Z-Cheat
categories.rules:
Timing starts when you select New Game.
Timing ends when regular gameplay continues after the proposal cutscene ends.
Pressing Z on the third-port controller to obtain all items is not allowed.

Player must be the one to propose to Bachelor

Timing starts on selecting New Game
If you show you have 98% before the evaluation begins, timing ends when the credits begin.
If you do not have 98% before the evaluation begins, timing ends as soon as you can show that you have 98%

Any additional files used during the run, MUST be created during the run
The PSP version (Harvest Moon: Boy & Girl) is allowed
Runs must prove that they have 98% before timing ends.
The following are required, even on 88% copies (copies that do not count power berries):

- 10 power berries
- 10 dog hearts
- 10 horse hearts
- All 5 house expansions
- Full chicken coop
- Full barn (any combination of cows or sheep)
- 10 wife hearts
- 10 baby hearts
- 64 recipes

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
Timing starts on selecting New Game
Timing ends when the wedding ceremony begins

Any additional files used for the run MUST be created during the run.

categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
Timing starts on selecting New Game
Timing ends when the credits begin

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
Time starts when "New Game" is selected
Time ends on black screen after wedding

categories.name: Power Berries
categories.rules:
Time starts when "Start" is selected
Time ends when you pick up the last power berry
**Requires all 11 power Berries (Including Blue kappa Berry)**
***Make sure to show all your power berries on your "earnings" screen after your run***
*No need to be Single Segment, Just show your "earnings" Menu, while still timing, before you segment*

subcategories.name: Thomas's Request
subcategories.rules:
Time starts when "Start" is selected
Time ends when Thomas walks off your farm after finishing his request

subcategories.name: Obtain Teleport Stone
subcategories.rules:
Time starts when "Start" is selected
Time ends upon holding the Teleport Stone above the player's head as it is first received

hmholv.name: Harvest Moon: Hero of Leaf Valley

subcategories.name: Alice
subcategories.rules: Alice must be paid 50,000G at the end of Year 2.

subcategories.name: Nature Reserve
subcategories.rules: The Nature Reserve ending path must be completed.

subcategories.name: Tourist Spot
subcategories.rules: The Tourist Spot ending path must be completed.

categories.name: Story %
categories.rules:
Reach the end credit screen by restoring the lighthouse.   No major glitches allowed.

Game must be run on Special Edition/current patch to be entered into this category.

Time starts upon confirming name and birthday.
Time ends upon start of end credit scene.

categories.name: Story% Legacy
categories.rules:
Reach the end credit screen by restoring the lighthouse.   No major glitches allowed.

This mode is run on PC only and uses version 1.06 in order to not have any cutscenes that were added to the Special Edition release of the game.

Switch, PS4, and current patch runners please submit to the non-Legacy version.

Time starts upon confirming name and birthday.
Time ends upon start of end credit scene.

categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
Using any means reach the credit screen.  Glitches allowed.

Time starts upon confirming name and birthday.
Time ends upon start of end credit scene.

categories.name: Marriage%
categories.rules:
Reach the marriage cut scene with any of the eligible bachelors/bachelorettes.

Time starts upon confirming name and birthday.
Time ends upon start of marriage cut scene.

categories.name: Any%
categories.rules:
Complete the game with any 50 notes.
Timing starts after you "register your file"
Timing ends when the screen goes fully black when you enter the Goddess Spring for the last time.

categories.name: Glitchless
categories.rules:
Complete the game with any 50 notes.
Glitches may not be used in the run. Glitching any Blue Sky Ranch animals into buildings does not invalidate runs, as the glitch is unintended.
Timing starts after you "register your file"
Tming ends when the screen goes fully black when you enter the Goddess Spring for the last time.

categories.name: Marriage
categories.rules:
Get Married.
Tming starts after you "register your file"
Timing ends when you get the note "Wedding Day"

categories.name: All Notes
categories.rules:
Complete the game with all 100 notes.
Timing starts after you "register your file"
Timing ends when the screen goes fully black when you enter the Goddess Spring for the last time.
